klus.kernels module¶

class klus.kernels.Eigenfunction(k, X, v)¶

Bases: object

fdfeval(x)¶

Function and gradient evaluation.

feval(x)¶

Function evaluation.

klus.kernels.covariance(X, k)¶

Compute Covariance matrix for training data X with kernel k.

klus.kernels.crosscov(X, Y, k)¶

Compute crosscovariance matrix for training data X and Y with kernel k.

class klus.kernels.gaussianKernel(sigma)¶

Bases: object

Gaussian kernel with bandwidth sigma.

klus.kernels.gramian(X, k)¶

Compute Gram matrix for training data X with kernel k.

klus.kernels.gramian2(X, Y, k)¶

Compute Gram matrix for training data X and Y with kernel k.

class klus.kernels.laplacianKernel(sigma)¶

Bases: object

Laplacian kernel with bandwidth sigma.

class klus.kernels.polynomialKernel(p, c=1)¶

Bases: object

Polynomial kernel with degree p and inhomogeneity c.

class klus.kernels.stringKernel(kn=2, l=0.9)¶

Bases: object

String kernel implementation based on Marianna Madry’s C++ code, see https://github.com/mmadry/string_kernel.

evaluate(x, y)¶

Unnormalized string kernel evaluation.
